name.english: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl
name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル:アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahorōtoru

userHistory.method: Fed to Smiley by Caesar Clown

abilities.name: Axolotl Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into an axolotl or axolotl-hybrid form. When fed to the slime creature Smiley, it gave the toxic gas creature a physical form.

reveals.information: Caesar Clown fed this fruit to the condensed H2S gas slime, creating the creature Smiley

keyMoments.title: Smiley's Devil Fruit Revealed
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals he fed the Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl to the condensed toxic gas, creating Smiley.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Devil Fruits can be fed to non-living substances to give them life and form.

abilities.name: Wing
abilities.description: Creates wings using sprouted limbs to enable flight or gliding.

reveals.information: Robin can create wings using her powers, first shown in anime

keyMoments.title: Wing Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Wing technique for the first time in the anime, demonstrating enhanced control of her Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's post-timeskip advancement in Devil Fruit mastery.
